name: Princess Marilton
description:
"Where are you, Lily Marilton?

Within these strange lands, I catch glimpses of you, only to disappear like a mirage. It's been months since I've seen your lavender dress flowing within in the orchid where we chased eachother. It was only days since you cried for help when Homoprobe attacked our gardens. I remember you slipping away from my dress. I remember you being caught. I don't remember you escaping."

----Credits----

Artists: HanProgrammer
Musician and SFX Designer: Stutte
Programming: RubyLunari
Original Concept: Debra 'Hazumu' Cohen
Level Designers: RubyLunari & Debra 'Hazumu' Cohen
Character Designer: Mitchell Johnson
